name: T3 Aviation Academy
about: T3 Aviation Academy, founded in 2007, is the training and education arm of Air Arabia, specializing in comprehensive 360Â° aviation training. As a global leader in competency-based aviation learning, T3 offers the Multi-crew Pilot License (MPL) program, Airbus A320 Type Rating, and various other training solutions. With over 750 cadets and more than 400 graduates, T3 has a strong track record of placing pilots with leading airlines, particularly Air Arabia. The academy is approved by several aviation authorities and provides world-class training standards. Located in Sharjah, UAE, T3 Aviation Academy is committed to continuous growth and development in the aviation industry. It offers a holistic training experience, including ground school, core flying, and simulator training, ensuring cadets are well-prepared for their careers as commercial pilots.
